content: You can enter the crack in the wall, and on the other side you’ll find a chest containing the Loong Scales. With this item, you’ll be able to uncover the lair of the Loong Dragons.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
You can enter the crack in the wall, and on the other side you’ll find a chest containing the Loong Scales. With this item, you’ll be able to uncover the lair of the Loong Dragons.
